tests.name: CW 1.1: Proper HTML document structure
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain proper html and body tags"

tests.name: CW 1.2: Heading tag
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a proper heading tag from h1 to h6"

tests.name: CW 1.3: Paragraph Tag
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a paragraph tag"

tests.name: CW 1.4: div Tag
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a div tag"

tests.name: CW 1.5: List Tags
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a list: ul-li or ol-li tags"

tests.name: CW 1.6: Image Tag
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a proper image tag with valid image"

tests.name: CW 1.7: Link Tag
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a proper link tag with a valid external URL and linked text"

tests.name: CW 1.8: Form Tags
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a form: form, input, button tags"

tests.name: CW 1.9: Table Tags
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 1 submission: index.html should contain a multi-row table with correctly nested table, tr, td tags"

tests.name: CW 2.1: Inject external stylesheet into HTML
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should correctly insert style.css file into index.html"

tests.name: CW 2.2: Style and class attributes
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should add class or style attributes to elements in HTML"

tests.name: CW 2.3: Class selector
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should use a valid class selectors in style.css"

tests.name: CW 2.4: ID selector
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should use a valid id selectors in style.css"

tests.name: CW 2.5: Element selector
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should use element selectors in style.css"

tests.name: CW 2.6: Font color property
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should define a font color property in any CSS rule in style.css"

tests.name: CW 2.7: Margin property
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should define a margin property in any CSS rule in style.css"

tests.name: CW 2.8: Padding property
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should define a padding property in any CSS rule in style.css"

tests.name: CW 2.9: Width property
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should define a width property in any CSS rule in style.css"

tests.name: CW 2.10: Background color property
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 2 submission should define a background-color property in any CSS rule in style.css"

tests.name: CW 3.1: Insert external CSS file
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 3 submission should insert responsive.css file into index.html"

tests.name: CW 3.2: Viewport Meta tag
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 3 submission should insert responsive meta tag into index.html"

tests.name: CW 3.3: Device with small width
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 3 submission should apply a media query for devices less than 500px width in responsive.css"

tests.name: CW 3.4: Device with large width
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 3 submission should apply a media query for devices more than 1000px width in responsive.css"

tests.name: CW 3.5: Device width within a range
tests.run: npm test -- -t "Classwork 3 submission should apply a media query for devices within a given width range in responsive.css"
